name: Solitaire Free Classic Card Game: Online Hearts and Spider Multiplayer Plus
name_original: Solitaire Free Classic Card Game: Online Hearts and Spider Multiplayer Plus
description:
Do you love Solitaire?! Get all the classic Solitaire games in one app! All for FREE! This app will give you enough Solitaire games to last you for the rest of your life!

Features include:
- Preview hints
- Autoplay
- Unlimited undo
- Smooth card animations
- Drag and drop or simple select and move controls
- Move whole stacks quickly with simple tap controls
- Customize your colors
- Timing and scoring modes
- Supports all devices
- Relax mode makes the game faster and easier to win

It really doesn't get any better than having more than 70+ different games of solitaire to play! You will learn so many new and fun variations of this awesome classic card game!

Do you love Solitaire?! Get all the classic Solitaire games in one app! 70+ different variations total! ALL games unlocked and completely FREE!
